lexUnit.name: governor.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: head of a public institution or a state, district, etc.

sentence.text: Mobutu had ordered the troops to surround the bank and the Finance Ministry on Oct. 4 , after Tshisekedi had on Oct. 1 dismissed Nyemba Shabani as governor of the bank following the discovery that US$5,000,000 was missing from central reserves .
